#import all the libraries
import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import matplotlib.ticker as mtick
import seaborn as sns
source.64815aa2:
df.rename(columns = {'Type of injury':'Type_of_injury','Event location - District':'Event_location_District','Event location - Region': 'Event_location_region','Name':'Total','Type of injury':'Type_of_injury'}, inplace=True)
df.columns


df["Date of death"]=pd.to_datetime(df["Date of death"])
df["Date of event"]=pd.to_datetime(df["Date of event"])

df["Death_year"]=df["Date of death"].dt.year
df["Death_month"]=df["Date of death"].dt.month
df["Death_day"]=df["Date of death"].dt.day

df["Event_year"]=df["Date of event"].dt.year
df["Event_month"]=df["Date of event"].dt.month
df["Event_day"]=df["Date of event"].dt.day

source.a1d63ca7:
#Palestine Vs Israel Body Count

pal7 = pd.DataFrame(df, columns = ['Death_year','Event_location_region','Total'])
pal7_c=pal7.groupby(['Death_year','Event_location_region']).count()
pal7_c = pal7_c.reset_index(inplace=False)
#print(pal7_c)

dfb7= pal7_c.pivot(index='Death_year',columns='Event_location_region',values='Total') 
dfb7.rename(columns = {'Gaza Strip':'Gaza_Strip','West Bank':'West_Bank'}, inplace=True)
dfb7 = dfb7.reset_index(inplace=False)
dfb7['Gaza_Strip'] = dfb7['Gaza_Strip'].replace(np.nan, 0)
sum_column = dfb7["Gaza_Strip"] + dfb7["West_Bank"]
dfb7["Palestine"] = sum_column
#print(dfb7)

#Chart-Palestine Vs Israel Body Count

font_color = '#030336'
fig, ax = plt.subplots(figsize = (15,7), dpi = 80)
ax.set_facecolor('#f7f9fc')
fig.patch.set_facecolor('#f7f9fc')
ax=sns.barplot(data=dfb7,x='Death_year',y=dfb7['Palestine'],color="#0acafa",label='Palestine')
ax=sns.barplot(data=dfb7,x='Death_year',y=-dfb7['Israel'],color="#080e4d",label='Israel')
ax.text(-1,2900, 'Palestine Vs Israel Body Count                                                                                    ', {'color':'#ebebf5','backgroundcolor':'#030336','font': 'serif','color':'#fcfcff', 'fontsize': 18, 'weight':'bold'},alpha = 0.9 )
ax.text(-1.2,2700, 'In Palestine highest death toll has been recorded in 3rd Gaza war in 2014 where as in Israel highest death toll has been', {'backgroundcolor':'#f7f9fc','font': 'serif','color':'#080e4d', 'fontsize': 12, 'weight':'bold'},alpha = 0.9 )
ax.text(-1.2,2550,' recorded in 2002.', {'backgroundcolor':'#f7f9fc','font': 'serif','color':'#080e4d', 'fontsize': 12, 'weight':'bold'},alpha = 0.9 )
plt.legend(title="Event Location Region")
plt.xticks(color=font_color)
plt.yticks(color=font_color)
ax.set_xlabel('Years',fontsize=15,fontweight="bold",color='#080e4d')
ax.set_ylabel('Total',fontsize=15,fontweight="bold",color='#080e4d')
ax.text(11, 2200, 
        '3rd Gaza War ⟶', 
         fontsize=10, 
         fontweight='bold', 
         fontfamily='serif',
         color='#080e4d')

#Body Count by Year and Event Location Region
pal = pd.DataFrame(df, columns = ['Death_year','Event_location_region','Total'])
pal_c=pal.groupby(['Death_year','Event_location_region']).count()
pal_c = pal_c.reset_index(inplace=False)
#print(pal_c)

#chart-Body Count by Year and Event Location Region
font_color = '#030336'
csfont = {'fontname':'Georgia'} # title font
hfont = {'fontname':'Calibri'} # main font
palette = sns.color_palette(["#0acafa","#17518f","#080e4d"])
fig, ax3 = plt.subplots(figsize = (15,7), dpi = 80)
ax3.set_facecolor('#f7f9fc')
fig.patch.set_facecolor('#f7f9fc')
ax3=sns.barplot(x='Death_year',y='Total', hue='Event_location_region',palette=palette,data=pal_c)
ax3.text(-1,2900, 'Body Count By Year & Event location Region                                                            ', {'color':'#ebebf5','backgroundcolor':'#030336','font': 'serif','color':'#fcfcff', 'fontsize': 18, 'weight':'bold'},alpha = 0.9 )
ax3.text(-1.2,2700, 'In Gaza Strip highest death toll has been recorded in 3rd Gaza war in 2014 and in West Bank highest death toll has been', {'backgroundcolor':'#f7f9fc','font': 'serif','color':'#080e4d', 'fontsize': 12, 'weight':'bold'},alpha = 0.9 )
ax3.text(-1.2,2550,'recorded in 2002 where as in Israel highest death toll has been recorded in 2002.', {'backgroundcolor':'#f7f9fc','font': 'serif','color':'#080e4d', 'fontsize': 12, 'weight':'bold'},alpha = 0.9 )
plt.legend(title="Event Location Region")
plt.xticks(color=font_color)
plt.yticks(color=font_color)
ax3.set_xlabel('Years',fontsize=15,fontweight="bold",color='#080e4d')
ax3.set_ylabel('Total',fontsize=15,fontweight="bold",color='#080e4d')
ax3.text(11, 2200, 
        '3rd Gaza War ⟶', 
         fontsize=10, 
         fontweight='bold', 
         fontfamily='serif',
         color='#080e4d')
source.6442b15a:
#Body count by year and month
Israel = df[(df.Event_location_region == 'Israel')]
shape = Israel.shape
#print(shape)

Palestine=df[(df.Event_location_region != 'Israel')]
shape = Palestine.shape
#print(shape)
pal6 = pd.DataFrame(Palestine, columns = ['Death_year','Death_month','Total'])
pal6_c=pal6.groupby(['Death_year','Death_month']).count()
pal6_c = pal6_c.reset_index(inplace=False)
#print(pal6_c)

pal7 = pd.DataFrame(Israel, columns = ['Death_year','Death_month','Total'])
pal7_c=pal7.groupby(['Death_year','Death_month']).count()
pal7_c = pal7_c.reset_index(inplace=False)
#print(pal7_c)

#chart-Body count by year and month
fig = plt.figure(figsize=(15,15),dpi=80, facecolor='w', edgecolor='k')

gs = fig.add_gridspec(1,2)
gs.update(wspace=0.1, hspace=0)
ax0 = fig.add_subplot(gs[0, 0])
ax1 = fig.add_subplot(gs[0, 1])

background_color = "#f7f9fc"
fig.patch.set_facecolor(background_color) 
ax0.set_facecolor(background_color) 
ax1.set_facecolor(background_color)
pp=pal6_c.pivot("Death_year","Death_month","Total")
ii=pal7_c.pivot("Death_year","Death_month","Total")
colors = ["#fbfbfb", "#4b4b4c","#008294"]

colormap = matplotlib.colors.LinearSegmentedColormap.from_list("", colors)
sns.heatmap(ax=ax0,data=pp,linewidths=.1,square=True,annot=False,cbar_kws={"shrink": 0.5,"drawedges":True},cbar=True,cmap=colormap,color='#030336')
sns.heatmap(ax=ax1,data=ii,linewidths=.1,square=True,annot=False,cbar_kws={"shrink": 0.5,"drawedges":True},cbar=True,cmap=colormap,color='#030336')
ax0.text(-2.5, -4.0, 
         'Palestine Vs Israel death toll by year and month                                                           ', 
          fontsize=20, fontweight='bold', fontfamily='serif',color='#ebebf5',backgroundcolor='#030336')

ax0.text(-2.5, -3.0, 
         'In Palestine highest death toll 1,610 has been recorded in July 2014 where as in Israel highest death toll 85 has been recorded in Mar 2002.', 
          {'backgroundcolor':'#f7f9fc','font': 'serif','color':'#080e4d', 'fontsize': 12, 'weight':'bold'},alpha = 0.9 )
ax0.text(0, -0.2, 'Palestine(Gaza Strip & West Bank)', fontsize=15, fontweight='bold', fontfamily='serif',color='#030336')
ax1.text(0, -0.2, 'Israel', fontsize=15, fontweight='bold', fontfamily='serif',color='#030336')
ax0.set_xlabel("Months",fontsize=15, fontweight='bold', fontfamily='serif',color='#030336')
ax0.set_ylabel("Years",fontsize=15, fontweight='bold', fontfamily='serif',color='#030336')
ax1.set_xlabel("Months",fontsize=15, fontweight='bold', fontfamily='serif',color='#030336')
ax1.set_ylabel("Years",fontsize=15, fontweight='bold', fontfamily='serif',color='#030336')
source.fd1abf01:
#Body Count by Palestine District

pal2 = pd.DataFrame(df, columns = ['Event_location_District','Total'])
pal2_c=pal2.groupby(['Event_location_District']).count()
pal2_c = pal2_c.reset_index(inplace=False)
pal2_c.sort_values(by=['Total'], inplace=True)
#print(pal2_c)

#Chart-Body Count by Palestine District

data  = pal2_c['Total']
fig = plt.figure(figsize=(12,8), dpi = 80)
fig.patch.set_facecolor('#f7f9fc')
ax = plt.subplot(polar=True)
plt.axis('off')


labels = ['Gaza Strip ', 'Salfit',
         'Jericho', 'Tubas',
         'Qalqiliya', 'Gush Katif',
          'Al-Quds', 'East Jerusalem',
          'Bethlehem','Tulkarm',
          'Ramallah and al-Bira','Hebron',
          'Jenin','Nablus','Israel',
          'Deir al-Balah', 'Rafah',
          'Khan Yunis','North Gaza',
          'Gaza']

colors = [ '#324e85', '#324e85', '#324e85', '#324e85', '#324e85', '#324e85', '#324e85', '#324e85', '#324e85', '#324e85','#324e85','#324e85', '#324e85', '#324e85', '#060d1c', '#324e85', '#324e85','#324e85','#324e85','#324e85']
# Constants = parameters controling the plot layout:
upperLimit = 2000
lowerLimit = 800
labelPadding = 500

# Compute max and min in the dataset
max = data.max()

slope = (max - lowerLimit) / max
heights = slope * data.values + lowerLimit

# Compute the width of each bar. In total we have 2*Pi = 360°
width = 2*np.pi / len(data.index)

# Compute the angle each bar is centered on:
indexes = list(range(1, len(data)+1))
angles = [element * width for element in indexes]


# Draw bars
bars = ax.bar(
    x=angles, 
    height=heights, 
    width=width, 
    bottom=lowerLimit,
    linewidth=2, 
    edgecolor="#f6f5f5",
    color = colors
)

# Add labels
for bar, angle, height, label in zip(bars,angles, heights, labels):

    # Labels are rotated. Rotation must be specified in degrees :(
    rotation = np.rad2deg(angle)

    # Flip some labels upside down
    alignment = ""
    if angle >= np.pi/2 and angle < 3*np.pi/2:
        alignment = "right"
        rotation = rotation + 180
    else: 
        alignment = "left"

    # Finally add the labels
    ax.text(
        x=angle,
        y=lowerLimit + bar.get_height() + labelPadding, 
        s=label, 
        ha=alignment, 
        va='center', 
        rotation=rotation, 
        rotation_mode="anchor",**{'font':'serif', 'size':12, 'weight':'bold','color':'#030361'},alpha = 0.9) 
fig.text(0.25,1.1,'Body Count by Palestine Districts                                           ',{'backgroundcolor':'#030361','font': 'serif','color':'#f7f9fc', 'fontsize': 18, 'weight':'bold'},alpha = 0.9 )
fig.text(0.25,1.005,'Highest death has been recorded in the district Gaza.',{'backgroundcolor':'#f7f9fc','font': 'serif','color':'#030361', 'fontsize': 12, 'weight':'bold'},alpha = 0.9)

fig.show()
source.1e0bf4f2:
#Palestine Vs Israel Death Reason
pal3 = pd.DataFrame(df, columns = ['Event_location_region','Reason','Total'])
pal3_c=pal3.groupby(['Event_location_region','Reason']).count()
pal3_c = pal3_c.reset_index(inplace=False)
dfb3= pal3_c.pivot(index='Reason',columns='Event_location_region',values='Total') 
dfb3.rename(columns = {'Gaza Strip':'Gaza_Strip','West Bank':'West_Bank'}, inplace=True)
dfb3 = dfb3.reset_index(inplace=False)
#print(dfb3)   

#Chart-Palestine Vs Israel Death Reason
font_color = '#030361'
fig = plt.figure(figsize=(10,12))
gs = fig.add_gridspec(3,1)
gs.update(wspace=0, hspace=0.5)
ax0 = fig.add_subplot(gs[0, 0], xlim=(0, 8000))
ax1 = fig.add_subplot(gs[1, 0], xlim=(0, 8000))
ax2 = fig.add_subplot(gs[2, 0], xlim=(0, 8000))
background_color = "#f7f9fc"
fig.patch.set_facecolor(background_color)
ax0.set_facecolor(background_color)
ax1.set_facecolor(background_color)
ax2.set_facecolor(background_color)


color_map = ["#030361" for _ in range(5)]
ax0.barh(dfb3["Reason"],dfb3["Gaza_Strip"],color=color_map, zorder=3)
ax0.text(1.1,4,
         'Gaza Strip', 
         fontsize=15, 
         fontweight='bold', 
         fontfamily='serif',
         color='#030361'
        )


ax1.barh(dfb3["Reason"],dfb3["West_Bank"],color=color_map, zorder=3)
ax1.text(1.1,5,
         'West Bank', 
         fontsize=15, 
         fontweight='bold', 
         fontfamily='serif',
         color='#030361'
        )

ax2.barh(dfb3["Reason"],dfb3["Israel"],color=color_map, zorder=3)
ax2.text(1.1,5,
         'Israel', 
         fontsize=15, 
         fontweight='bold', 
         fontfamily='serif',
         color='#030361'
        )

ax0.text(-1.1,6,'Death Reason district wise                                               ',{'backgroundcolor':'#030361','font': 'serif','color':'#f7f9fc', 'fontsize': 18, 'weight':'bold'},alpha = 0.9)
ax0.text(-1.1,5,'Mostly people killed by Israel Security Forces in Palestine ',{'font': 'serif','color':'#030361', 'fontsize': 12, 'weight':'bold'},alpha = 0.9)
plt.setp(ax0.get_xticklabels(), color="#030361")
plt.setp(ax0.get_yticklabels(), color="#030361")
plt.setp(ax1.get_xticklabels(), color="#030361")
plt.setp(ax1.get_yticklabels(), color="#030361")
plt.setp(ax2.get_xticklabels(), color="#030361")
plt.setp(ax2.get_yticklabels(), color="#030361")
fig.show()
source.c37db6e5:
#Palestine Vs Israel Body Count By Gender
df['Gender'] = df['Gender'].replace(0,"Unknown")  
pal4 = pd.DataFrame(df, columns = ['Event_location_region','Gender','Total'])
pal4_c=pal4.groupby(['Event_location_region','Gender']).count()
pal4_c = pal4_c.reset_index(inplace=False)
dfb4= pal4_c.pivot(index='Gender',columns='Event_location_region',values='Total') 
dfb4.rename(columns = {'Gaza Strip':'Gaza_Strip','West Bank':'West_Bank'}, inplace=True)
dfb4 = dfb4.reset_index(inplace=False)
dfb4['Gender'] = dfb4['Gender'].replace("F","Female") 
dfb4['Gender'] = dfb4['Gender'].replace("M","Male") 
sum_column = dfb4["Gaza_Strip"] + dfb4["West_Bank"]
dfb4["Palestine"] = sum_column

#print(dfb4)  

#chart-Palestine Vs Israel Body Count By Gender

fig = plt.figure(figsize=(10,5)) 
gs = fig.add_gridspec(1,2)
gs.update(wspace=0.1, hspace=0)
ax0 = fig.add_subplot(gs[0, 0])
ax1 = fig.add_subplot(gs[0, 1]) 
background_color = "#f7f9fc"
fig.patch.set_facecolor(background_color)
ax0.set_facecolor(background_color) 
color_map = ["#cc0e90", "#1a1ab8", "#04041a"]
ax0.pie(x=dfb4['Palestine'], colors=color_map, wedgeprops=dict(width=0.2))
ax0.text(-1.5, 2.5, 'Death by Gender                                                       ', fontsize=20, fontweight='bold', fontfamily='serif',color='#f7f9fc',backgroundcolor='#030361')
ax0.text(-1.5, 2.1, 'Male death is more as compared to female in both Palestine and Israel.', 
         fontsize=13,fontweight='bold', fontfamily='serif',color='#030361')
ax0.text(0, 1.2, 'Palestine(Gaza Strip & West Bank)', fontsize=13, fontweight='bold', fontfamily='serif', horizontalalignment='center',color='#030361')
ax0.legend(dfb4["Gender"], loc="lower right", bbox_to_anchor=(0.5, -0.5))

ax1.pie(x=dfb4['Israel'], colors=color_map, wedgeprops=dict(width=0.2))
ax1.text(0, 1.2, 'Israel', fontsize=13, fontweight='bold', fontfamily='serif', horizontalalignment='center',color='#030361')
source.9058367d:
pd.set_option("display.max_rows", None)

 
pal8 = pd.DataFrame(df, columns = ['Event_location_region','Age','Gender','Total'])
pal8_c=pal8.groupby(['Event_location_region','Age','Gender']).count()
pal8_c = pal8_c.reset_index(inplace=False)
conditions = [
    ((pal8_c['Age'] >= 0) & (pal8_c['Age'] <= 5)),
    ((pal8_c['Age'] >= 6) & (pal8_c['Age'] <= 10)),
    ((pal8_c['Age'] >= 11) & (pal8_c['Age'] <= 15)),
    ((pal8_c['Age'] >= 16) & (pal8_c['Age'] <= 20)),
    ((pal8_c['Age'] >= 21) & (pal8_c['Age'] <= 25)),
    ((pal8_c['Age'] >= 26) & (pal8_c['Age'] <= 30)),
    ((pal8_c['Age'] >= 31) & (pal8_c['Age'] <= 35)),
    ((pal8_c['Age'] >= 36) & (pal8_c['Age'] <= 40)),
    ((pal8_c['Age'] >= 41) & (pal8_c['Age'] <= 45)),
    ((pal8_c['Age'] >= 46) & (pal8_c['Age'] <= 50)),
    ((pal8_c['Age'] >= 51) & (pal8_c['Age'] <= 55)),
    ((pal8_c['Age'] >= 56) & (pal8_c['Age'] <= 60)),
    (pal8_c['Age'] >= 61),
]

choices = ['0-5','6-10','11-15','16-20','21-25','26-30','31-35','36-40','41-45','46-50','51-55','56-60','60+']

pal8_c['AgeGroup'] = np.select(conditions, choices)
pal8_c['Gender'] = pal8_c['Gender'].replace(0,"Unknown") 
pal8_c['Gender'] = pal8_c['Gender'].replace("F","Female") 
pal8_c['Gender'] = pal8_c['Gender'].replace("M","Male") 
#print(pal8_c)
Israel_age = pal8_c[(pal8_c.Event_location_region == 'Israel')]


Palestine_age=pal8_c[(pal8_c.Event_location_region != 'Israel')]

font_color = '#030361'
fig = plt.figure(figsize=(15,7),dpi = 80)
gs = fig.add_gridspec(2,1)
gs.update(wspace=0, hspace=0.5)
ax0 = fig.add_subplot(gs[0, 0], xlim=(0, 8000))
ax1 = fig.add_subplot(gs[1, 0], xlim=(0, 8000))

background_color = "#f7f9fc"
fig.patch.set_facecolor(background_color)
ax0.set_facecolor(background_color)
ax1.set_facecolor(background_color)

palette = sns.color_palette(["#cc0e90", "#1a1ab8","#04041a"])
sns.barplot(ax=ax0,x='AgeGroup',y='Total',hue='Gender',palette=palette,data=Israel_age,ci=None)
sns.barplot(ax=ax1,x='AgeGroup',y='Total',hue='Gender',palette=palette,data=Palestine_age,ci=None)
ax0.text(-1,28,
         'Israel', 
         fontsize=15, 
         fontweight='bold', 
         fontfamily='serif',
         color='#030361'
        )
ax0.legend(title="Gender",loc='upper right')

ax1.text(-1,300,
         'Palestine', 
         fontsize=15, 
         fontweight='bold', 
         fontfamily='serif',
         color='#030361'
        )
ax0.text(-1,45, 'Body Count By Age Group                                                                                            ', {'color':'#ebebf5','backgroundcolor':'#030336','font': 'serif','color':'#fcfcff', 'fontsize': 18, 'weight':'bold'},alpha = 0.9 )
ax0.text(-1.2,40, 'In Palestine and Israel highest number of people died in the age group 16-25.Black bar shows age & gender is not identified', {'backgroundcolor':'#f7f9fc','font': 'serif','color':'#080e4d', 'fontsize': 12, 'weight':'bold'},alpha = 0.9 )

ax1.legend(title="Gender",loc='upper right')

ax0.set_xlabel('Age Group',fontsize=15,fontweight="bold",color='#080e4d')
ax0.set_ylabel('Total',fontsize=15,fontweight="bold",color='#080e4d')
ax1.set_xlabel('Age Group',fontsize=15,fontweight="bold",color='#080e4d')
ax1.set_ylabel('Total',fontsize=15,fontweight="bold",color='#080e4d')
source.fa092538:
pal5 = pd.DataFrame(df, columns = ['Event_location_region','Type_of_injury','Total'])
pal5_c=pal5.groupby(['Event_location_region','Type_of_injury']).count()
pal5_c = pal5_c.reset_index(inplace=False)

#print(pal1_c)
pal5_c['Type_of_injury'] = pal5_c['Type_of_injury'].replace(0,"Unknown")  
pal5_c['Type_of_injury'] = pal5_c['Type_of_injury'].str.capitalize()
#print(pal5_c)
dfb5= pal5_c.pivot(index='Type_of_injury',columns='Event_location_region',values='Total') 
dfb5.rename(columns = {'Gaza Strip':'Gaza_Strip','West Bank':'West_Bank'}, inplace=True)
dfb5 = dfb5.reset_index(inplace=False)
dfb5['Type_of_injury'] = dfb5['Type_of_injury'].str.capitalize()
dfb5['Gaza_Strip'] = dfb5['Gaza_Strip'].replace(np.nan, 0)
dfb5['West_Bank'] = dfb5['West_Bank'].replace(np.nan, 0)
dfb5['Israel'] = dfb5['Israel'].replace(np.nan, 0)
sum_column = dfb5["Gaza_Strip"] + dfb5["West_Bank"]
dfb5["Palestine"] = sum_column
#print(dfb5)

fig = plt.figure(figsize=(10,12)) # create figure
gs = fig.add_gridspec(1,2)
gs.update(wspace=0.1, hspace=0)
ax0 = fig.add_subplot(gs[0, 0])
ax1 = fig.add_subplot(gs[0, 1])
background_color = "#f7f9fc"
fig.patch.set_facecolor(background_color)
ax0.set_facecolor(background_color) 
# Change background color
font_color = '#030336'
csfont = {'fontname':'Georgia'} # title font
hfont = {'fontname':'Calibri'} # main font
color_map = ["#f7746a", "#eb9d31", "#848f0b","#98ed64","#8af2da","#1089c2","#47b3a4","#0b6170","#792e99","#ad0aa3","#850c40","#406624","#c2e9f2","#f0a8ef"]
lab=["Beating","Being bludgeoned with an axe","Dropping a heavy object","Explosion","Fire","Gunfire","Hit by a vehicle","House demolition","Physically assaulted","Shelling","Stabbing","Stones throwing","Strangulation","Unknown"]
#ax=sns.barplot(data=dfb5,x=dfb5['Type_of_injury'],y=dfb5['Palestine'],color="#0acafa",label='Palestine')
#ax=sns.barplot(data=dfb5,x=dfb5['Type_of_injury'],y=dfb5['Israel'],color="#080e4d",label='Israel')
ax0.pie(x=dfb5['Palestine'],colors=color_map)
ax1.pie(x=dfb5['Israel'],colors=color_map)
ax0.legend(title="Type of Injuries")
ax0.legend(lab, bbox_to_anchor=(1., 1.02, 2., .102))
#plt.legend(title="Type of Injuries")
ax0.text(-2.1,2,  
         'Palestine Vs Israel Type of Injuries                                                                     ', 
          fontsize=20, fontweight='bold', fontfamily='serif',color='#ebebf5',backgroundcolor='#030336')
ax0.text(0, 1.2, 'Palestine(Gaza Strip & West Bank)', fontsize=13, fontweight='bold', fontfamily='serif', horizontalalignment='center',color='#030361')

ax0.text(-2.1,1.7, 
         'In Palestine highest type of injuries are by gun fire where as in Israel highest type of injuries are by explosion.', 
         {'backgroundcolor':'#f7f9fc','font': 'serif','color':'#080e4d', 'fontsize': 12, 'weight':'bold'},alpha = 0.9 )

ax1.text(0, 1.2, 'Israel', fontsize=13, fontweight='bold', fontfamily='serif', horizontalalignment='center',color='#030361')

plt.setp(ax.get_xticklabels(), color="#030361")
plt.setp(ax.get_yticklabels(), color="#030361")
plt.show()
source.c0c92893:
import geopandas as gpd
import folium
dfp = pd.read_csv("../input/longitude-and-latitude/Long_Lats.csv")
dfgeo=gpd.GeoDataFrame(dfp, geometry=gpd.points_from_xy(dfp.Longitude,dfp.Latitude))

m =  folium.Map(location = [31.15240, 34.99482],zoom_start = 7,tiles='CartoDB positron')

for _, r in dfgeo.iterrows():
    folium.Marker(location=[r['Latitude'],r['Longitude']], popup='District: {} </n> Total Death: {}'.format(r['District'],r['Total'])).add_to(m)

m

from numpy import mean
from numpy import std
data1 = dfb7["Palestine"]
data2 = dfb7["Israel"]
print('Palestine: mean=%.3f stdv=%.3f' % (mean(data1), std(data1)))
print('Israel: mean=%.3f stdv=%.3f' % (mean(data2), std(data2)))
source.be6f8fbc:
import scipy
from scipy.stats import pearsonr

data1 = dfb7["Palestine"]
data2 = dfb7["Israel"]
stat, p = pearsonr(data1, data2)
print('stat=%.3f, p=%.3f' % (stat, p))
if p > 0.05:
  print('Probably independent')
else:
  print('Probably dependent')
print('p value is not significant so there is low correlation between Palestinians killed and Israelis killed.')
